div.p: Da..., 5th indiction, as follows: artabas of wheat ⟦513⟧, ⟦choinikes 6⟧ total artabas 654 choinikes 5, total? artabas ⟦7⟧1,000 [...] Olympiados, 5th indiction, as follows: … total artabas 669 ⅔. Olympiados, 6th indiction, as follows: total artabas 812. Total artabas 4,900 [...] Olympiados, 7th indiction, as follows: total artabas ⟦664⟧ 766. Xenacharous, 6th indiction, as follows: artabas of wheat 916 ⅔ [...] Translation: N. Gonis, P.Harr. 3 280
